title: Annual General Meeting Notice
details:
Dear Residents,

This is to inform you that the Annual General Meeting (AGM) of Nextland Society will be held on February 15, 2026, at 4:00 PM in the Society Clubhouse.

Agenda:
1. Approval of previous year's minutes
2. Financial report presentation
3. Election of Management Committee members
4. Discussion on proposed maintenance increase
5. Any other business

All residents are requested to attend.

Regards,
Management Committee
